result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Armoni Deantre Bell

records.addlTxt:
1:22 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: V. Kasten, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Travis Satorius in court for Armoni Deantre Bell. Defendant Armoni Deantre Bell in court, in custody. Court reviews file. Court reviews amended criminal complaint filed. Atty. Satorius states DE needs to contact PD's office to apply but believes he will qualify, makes bond argument. ADA Damrau responds. Court continues bond. Court sets PH. Adjourned: 1:30 PM. kma
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

10:32 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Armoni Deantre Bell in court, in custody. Set for PH. DE states that he is eligible for public defender. ADA Damrau states that he does not believe DE ever applied for public defender. DE states that he wishes to proceed without attorney. Court finds good cause to extend prelim time for scheduling. Court sets BBH for this afternoon to allow DE to apply for public defender. Adjourned: 10:34 AM. kma
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-Signed Waiver of Extradition, signed by DE. bph
Pretrial Assessment Report, SRN reviewed during INIT. bph

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, M. Tirado.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. 

Defendant to sign Pre-Signed Waiver of Extradition

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:15 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Armoni Deantre Bell in court, in custody.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Armoni Deantre Bell.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.  DE states he does not need a PD would like to represent himself.  DE confirms address. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. Bond argument.  Court orders bond and schedules next court date.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 4, 2022 at 10:30 am.
